resources.string: Are you sure you want to logout? Note: This will prevent the application from sending data to your account.
Unable to establish an internet connection. Please try again later!
This application requires an event code or active account to join a challenge.

string.name: click_get_more_info
string.u: Click here to get more info

resources.string: An error has occurred! Please try again later.
Unauthorized! Please try again with a valid email and password.
Time to Get Active for Good!
We\'ll send a link to your email

string.name: register_external
string.u: Click here to create your account via a web browser then come back to this app to log in.

resources.string: You are already part of this challenge
Active calories you burn during this challenge will be converted into life-saving food packets for malnourished kids.
The Power Points you earn in this challenge will be converted into life-saving food packets for malnourished kids.
%s is donating %s calorie(s) for every one calorie(s) burned in this challenge.
%s is donating %s packet(s) of therapeutic food for every five Power Point(s) earned in this challenge.
Start by creating a new Calorie Cloud account.
Pick a team to get active with.
Use this phone as a tracker
Please select a team to join the challenge!
Please select a region and a team to join the challenge!
You have joined the challenge. The last step is to authorize your phone as an activity tracker. Don\'t worry, you can switch trackers later.
It\'s Time to Get Active For Good!

This application requires access to your activity data from Google Fit.\n\nPlease click on the button below, select your Google account, and allow this application to connect to Google Fit. Please make sure your Google Fit account is set up.
Note, this will set your device as the default activity tracker in your account.
This device is now linked to your account as your current activity tracker.
This application is sending activity data from Google Fit to your account.
Allow this application to send active calorie and step data from Google Fit to your account.
Connect as many trackers as you like. Your connected tracker will sync data to your challenges.

We will be adding the ability to manage other tracking devices via our mobile app very soon, but for today please click on the button below to use your web browser to manage trackers other than your phone.
Want to use a different activity tracker? Tap to manage trackers online
To view progress visit the challenge dashboard (will open in a web browser)
Syncing data. We\'re preparing your stats\nbut you can still get active!
You still need to authorize your phone as\nan activity tracker or add another tracker

string.name: no_account_back
string.u: Don\'t have an account?\nGo back and create one.

resources.string: Login to your account\n to join this challenge
Calorie Cloud uses Google Fit\nto collect your active calories
On the next screen you will need to choose\nan account and allow Calorie Cloud to read data
You are in the challenge! The first sync may take a little while. In the meantime, why not enjoy getting active?
